ygData.subject: Re: [SPOILER] [eqbards] Rubicite Armor
ygData.msgSnippet: here it is... obviously all in Cazic-Thule. Legs: Throne Room, Tae Ew Templar Bracers: Throne Room, Tae Ew Diviner Boots: Bubble Room, Cazic Cenobite Chest:
ygData.messageBody:
here it is...

obviously all in Cazic-Thule.

Legs: Throne Room, Tae Ew Templar
Bracers: Throne Room, Tae Ew Diviner
Boots: Bubble Room, Cazic Cenobite
Chest: Bubble Room, Avatar of Fear (contrary to recent post, it does not add
10 to all stats, i wish, but is merely ac 19, light, and gives rubicite aura
which increases your health regen rate)
Helm: Above Throne Room, Stone Golem
Gloves: Gator Hall, Steel Golem
Arms: Top of Ziggurat, Tae Ew Archon

there you go, every piece =)
